alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Charlotte and northeastern Lee Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Southwest Florida Airport, or near Lehigh Acres, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Punta Gorda, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Babcock Webb Wma, Cypress Lake, McGregor, Pine Manor, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Olga, Buckingham, Villas, Three Oaks, San Carlos Park and Iona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
